name: rural_connections
description:
After struggling for years to find a satisfying job related to your field of studies -- telecommunications, you stumbled upon an opportunity where you can get a more hands on approach.

The catch: it's located at a rural part of the country, on top of a mountain.

Disclaimer: The developer's does not possessed a undergraduate or postgraduate certification in the field of telecommunication. Everything you see here is created with the developer's imagination. Think of the whole concept as a bunch of gibberish put together in the form of a interactive medium.
